member.name: ACCESS_MODE
member.summary: The ACCESS_MODE enumeration contains values that indicate how the access rights in an structure apply to the trustee. Functions such as and use these values to set or retrieve information in an access control entry (ACE).

member.name: ACCESS_MODE.GRANT_ACCESS
member.summary: Indicates an structure. The new ACE combines the specified rights with any existing allowed or denied rights of the trustee.

summary.para: Indicates an structure that allows the specified rights.
On input, this value discards any existing access control information for the trustee.
Indicates an structure that denies the specified rights.
On input, this value denies the specified rights in addition to any currently denied rights of the trustee.

member.name: ACCESS_MODE.REVOKE_ACCESS
member.summary: Indicates that all existing or structures for the specified trustee are removed.

summary.para: Indicates a structure that generates audit messages for successful attempts to use the specified access rights.
On input, this value combines the specified rights with any existing audited access rights for the trustee.
Indicates a structure that generates audit messages for failed attempts to use the specified access rights.
On input, this value combines the specified rights with any existing audited access rights for the trustee.
